languages.text: {n}Маражай прожигает вас взглядом, в котором мешается удивление, недоумение... и медленно разгорающийся восторг. Друкари склоняет голову набок, любуясь вами как собственным творением. Острые когти перчатки скользят по линии вашей челюсти, его голос падает до шепота, слышного лишь вам.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} наивн{mf|ый|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}... ты думаешь, что столь легко избавишься от того, кем ты стал{mf||а} по моей воле? Нет, {name}. Но за твою покорность... я подарю тебе жизнь того, кого ты только что променял{mf||а} на себя".

{n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. The sharp claws of his glove slide along your jawline, his voice dropping to a whisper only you can hear:{/n} "My naive little pet... Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прожигает вас взглядом, в котором мешается удивление, недоумение... и медленно разгорающийся восторг. languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光仿佛灼烧着你，眼神中混杂着惊讶、困惑和……沸腾的喜悦，仿佛即将爆发，化成一片火海。他将头歪向一边，欣赏着你，仿佛你是他亲自造出来的造物一样。他手套上尖利的爪子滑过你的下巴，声音变成了耳语，只有你一个人听得到。{/n}“我天真的小宠物……你已经是我的东西了。你真的以为，你能轻轻松松地舍弃自己的性命吗？不行，{name}。不过，既然你这么顺从……我愿意将你刚刚献出的生命重新送给你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. The sharp claws of his glove slide along your jawline, his voice dropping to a whisper only you can hear:{/n} "My naive little pet... Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te abrasa con una mirada que mezcla sorpresa, perplejidad y... un deleite que se convierte en una llamarada de pasión. El Drukhari ladea la cabeza, admirándote como si fueras una obra de arte. Las afiladas garras de su guante recorren tu mandíbula y su voz baja a un susurro que solo tú puedes oír:{/n} «Mi ingenua mascotita... ¿Crees que puedes despojarte de quien has pasado a ser bajo mi influencia tan fácilmente? No, {name}. Pero recompensaré tu obediencia... te regalaré la vida que acabas de intercambiar por la tuya».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. The sharp claws of his glove slide along your jawline, his voice dropping to a whisper only you can hear:{/n} "My naive little pet... Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."

El Drukhari ladea la cabeza, admirándote como si fueras una obra de arte. Las afiladas garras de su guante recorren tu mandíbula y su voz baja a un susurro que solo tú puedes oír:{/n} «Mi ingenua mascotita... ¿Crees que puedes despojarte de quien has pasado a ser bajo mi influencia tan fácilmente? No, {name}. Pero recompensaré tu obediencia... te regalaré la vida que acabas de intercambiar por la tuya».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは様々な感情…驚きと困惑と…煮えたぎるような喜びの入り混じった表情であなたを見つめている。その感情は徐々に燃え上がっていくかのようだ。デュカーリは首を傾げ、まるであなたが自分の創造物であるかのようにうっとりと眺める。手袋の鋭い爪があなたの顎のラインをすべり、あなたにしか聞こえないほどのかすかな囁き声で話しかけてきた。{/n}「世間知らずの可愛いペットよ…俺様の勢力圏の中で、そう簡単に自由になれると思っていたか？いいや、{name}。だが、お前の従順の褒美に…たった今、お前が代わりに差し出した命を、お前に贈ってやろうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. The sharp claws of his glove slide along your jawline, his voice dropping to a whisper only you can hear:{/n} "My naive little pet... Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは様々な感情…驚きと困惑と…煮えたぎるような喜びの入り混じった表情であなたを見つめている。その感情は徐々に燃え上がっていくかのようだ。デュカーリは首を傾げ、まるであなたが自分の創造物であるかのようにうっとりと眺める。手袋の鋭い爪があなたの顎のラインをすべり、あなたにしか聞こえないほどのかすかな囁き声で話しかけてきた。{/n}「世間知らずの可愛いペットよ…俺様の勢力圏の中で、そう簡単に自由になれると思っていたか？いいや、{name}。だが、お前の従順の褒美に…たった今、お前が代わりに差し出した命を、お前に贈ってやろうじゃないか」

languages.text: {n}Le regard brûlant, Marazhai vous dévisage avec un mélange de surprise, de perplexité et... d'un certain ravissement. Le Drukhari penche la tête sur le côté et vous admire comme s'il vous avait {mf|créé|créée}. Les griffes aiguisées de son gant effleurent votre joue alors qu'il murmure de façon à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez entendre :{/n} « {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave, si {mf|naïf|naïve}... Pensez-vous vraiment pouvoir effacer si facilement ce que vous êtes {mf|devenu|devenue} sous mon influence ? Non, {name}. Mais puisque vous vous êtes {mf|montré obéissant|montrée obéissante}... je vais vous faire don de la vie que vous venez d'échanger. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. The sharp claws of his glove slide along your jawline, his voice dropping to a whisper only you can hear:{/n} "My naive little pet... Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard brûlant, Marazhai vous dévisage avec un mélange de surprise, de perplexité et... d'un certain ravissement. Pensez-vous vraiment pouvoir effacer si facilement ce que vous êtes {mf|devenu|devenue} sous mon influence ? Non, {name}. Mais puisque vous vous êtes {mf|montré obéissant|montrée obéissante}... je vais vous faire don de la vie que vous venez d'échanger. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirft dir einen brennenden Blick zu, in dem sich Überraschung mit Verwunderung mischt und mit ... glühendem Entzücken, das sich langsam zu einem Feuer aufbaut. Der Drukhari legt den Kopf schief und bewundert dich, als wärest du deine Schöpfung. Die scharfen Klauen seines Handschuhs gleiten dein Kinn entlang, und seine Stimme wird zu einem Flüstern, das nur du hören kannst:{/n} "Mein naives kleines Haustier ... Glaubt Ihr, Ihr könnt so leicht ablegen, wer Ihr unter meinem Einfluss geworden seid? Nein, {name}. Doch für Euren Gehorsam ... schenke ich Euch das Leben, das Ihr eben für Euer eigenes eingetauscht habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. The sharp claws of his glove slide along your jawline, his voice dropping to a whisper only you can hear:{/n} "My naive little pet... Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."

Der Drukhari legt den Kopf schief und bewundert dich, als wärest du deine Schöpfung. Die scharfen Klauen seines Handschuhs gleiten dein Kinn entlang, und seine Stimme wird zu einem Flüstern, das nur du hören kannst:{/n} "Mein naives kleines Haustier ... Glaubt Ihr, Ihr könnt so leicht ablegen, wer Ihr unter meinem Einfluss geworden seid? Nein, {name}. Doch für Euren Gehorsam ... schenke ich Euch das Leben, das Ihr eben für Euer eigenes eingetauscht habt."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana şaşkınlık, kafa karışıklığı ve... Patlamaya hazır bir coşkunun iç içe geçerek yavaşça kıvılcımlandığı, alev alev bir bakış atıyor. Drukhari, kafasını yana eğerek seni kendisi yaratmışçasına hayranlıkla izliyor. Eldivenindeki keskin pençeleri çene kemiğinin üzerinde kaydırıyor. Sesi, yalnızca senin duyabileceğin bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Minik saf hayvanım benim... Tesirim altında dönüştüğün kişiyi kolaylıkla başından savabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Hayır {name}. Ancak itaatkârlığının karşılığı olarak... Uğruna kendi hayatını sunduğun o hayatı sana hediye edeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sears you with a look that reveals mingled surprise, bewilderment, and... simmering delight, which is slowly building to a blaze. The Drukhari tilts his head to the side, admiring you as if you were his own creation. Do you think you can so easily cast off who you have become under my influence? No, {name}. But for your obedience... I will gift you the life that you just exchanged for your own."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, sana şaşkınlık, kafa karışıklığı ve... Patlamaya hazır bir coşkunun iç içe geçerek yavaşça yangına döndüğü, alev alev bir bakış atıyor. Drukhari, kafasını yana eğerek seni kendisi yaratmışçasına hayranlıkla izliyor. Eldivenindeki keskin pençeleri çene kemiğinin üzerinde kaydırıyor. Sesi, yalnızca senin duyabileceğin bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Minik saf hayvanım benim... Tesirim altında dönüştüğün kişiyi kolaylıkla başından savabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Hayır {name}. Ancak itaatkârlığının karşılığı olarak... Uğruna kendi hayatını sunduğun o hayatı sana hediye edeceğim."
